summary: Jamie is 21. She's from Atlanta. She's come to Brooklyn to visit her friend Samantha, but she can't find her. Jamie meets a stranger named Charlie on the subway and spends 24 hours hanging out with him.
cast: Erin Fisher|Cris Lankenau|Sarah Hellman|Joe Swanberg|Tucker Stone|Liz Bender|Karrie Crouse|Keegan DeWitt|Daryl Nuhn|Michael Tully|C. Mason Wells
title: Quiet City
